message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. How about $85?
I understand you're looking to pay a bit less, Bob. However, I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. How about we meet in the middle at $92.50?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  How about we split the difference and go with $88.75?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go that low, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. How about we try $91?
Alice, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to go up to $89.50.  Is that something we can work with?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. How about we try $90.25?
Alice, I understand you're close to your minimum, but I'm also very close to my maximum.  I'm going to stick with my last offer of $89.50.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
I understand you're sticking to your last offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $89.75?
